channel.title: Next Generation Bounty Hunter (317)
channel.description:
[CENTER]Base: Project Insanity Developers: Xx K03d xX (Me) , Hoodlum, Jinrake(Scoreboards)
Guys i put alot of time into this testing BH getting it perfect, not the best of quality(Code wise) but it's just my contribution, my last, y'all enjoy
Features,
Full bounty hunter
[ul][*]-Targets, [*]-Teleport to target, [*]-Bounty hunter cash reward system (To claim right click the banker and select "Collect") [*]-Rules (Such as no coins etc), [*]-Low, Med, High crators (works on different height levels, drops drop on different height levels) [*]-Bounty hunter Scoreboard fully operational[/ul]
-Warrior guild Great combat system Logs alot (Smite logs, trade, kills) -100% weapon poison system -Anti farming systems --Stunning 508 maps with the potential for great minigames such as clan wars. -PK Following (Range/Mage/Melee) All Perfect --Stunning barrage orbs -Working clan chat (includes Lootshare)
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/unbcw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/flk29s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35iyql4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/aellxs.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/jagscn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/29uxafr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/350q5ht.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2dvsmx0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/unbcw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/w7mqrs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/1HMRo[/img]
My last release, Give a thanks if you download please [url=http://uppit.com/d4al4jskk2l4/Server_filesBH.rar]Download Server.filesBH.rar @ UppIT[/url] [/CENTER]

item.title: Next Generation Bounty Hunter (317)
item.dc:creator: @rick_roll rick roll
item.description:
@rick_roll wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:27, topic:525257”][quote author=rick roll link=topic=643999.msg4348818#msg4348818 date=1376334712]

i added the .java files to your client with only the .class files. i wanted to know it it was alright with you if i posted the client on your server release? (i will only post the client if loved says its alright…)
http://i915.photobucket.com/albums/ac357/vvvvvvmage/bh_zps9e12b79b.png

Why didnt you just decompiled client.java and changed the IP xD
Why did u decompile everything

without compile errors? or decompile errors?

i only have one error its in the animable.java file. i am missing a return statement. but its a better start then anyone else i guess. (i am not trying to fix it.)
[/quote][/quote]
it does not work like that. you need way more .java files, not just client.java even tho that does change the ip…

Read full topic
